cockatrice_carddatabase.cards:
Gate Sentinel ARD W W 1 Creature - Vampire Knight 2/1 2 As long as its not your turn, Gate Sentinel has lifelink.
Eternal Lover ARD W 1W 2 Creature - Vampire Noble 2/1 2 As an additional cost to cast Eternal Lover reveal a Vampire card from your hand or pay 3. When Eternal Lover enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Sire ARD W W 1 Instant 3 Create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink. Until end of turn if you would gain life, gain that much life plus 1 instead.
Warden of Sacred Shores ARD U 1UU 3 Creature - Vampire Cleric 1/1 2 Flash When Warden of Sacred Shores enters the battlefield, if it was cast, counter target spell.
Mental Invasion ARD U U 1 Instant 3 Look at each players hand. Draw a card.
Competitive Advances ARD U 2U 3 Sorcery 3 Draw a card. At the beginning of the next upkeep if you have more cards in your hand than the player whose turn it is, draw 2 cards.
Drinker of Miseries ARD B B 1 Creature - Vampire Minion 0/3 2 Lifelink Whenever Drinker of Miseries becomes tapped, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.
Vampiric Brood ARD B 3B 4 Creature - Vampire Citizen 4/3 2 This spell costs 1 less to cast if you control a Vampire.
Moment of Craving ARD B 1B 2 Instant 3 Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
Blood Brother ARD B B 1 Creature - Vampire Berserker 1/2 2 Cannibalize — Whenever one or more creatures you control die for the first time each turn, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Child of Bloodlust ARD R 1R 2 Creature - Vampire Berserker 2/1 2 Cannibalize — Whenever one or more creatures you control die for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Child of Bloodlust.
Horde Warfare ARD R R 1 Instant 3 Horde Warfare deals 2 damage to two target creatures an opponent controls and one target creature you control.
Bloodlust ARD R R 1 Instant 3 Bloodlust deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature attacks or blocks this turn if able.
Rise and Fall ARD R 2R 3 Sorcery 3 Create three 1/1 red Vampire Berserker tokens with haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of your next end step.
Sole Survivor ARD G G 1 Creature - Vampire Survivor 1/1 2 Deathtouch, Trample
Cojocar Huntress ARD G 1G 2 Creature - Vampire Survivor 2/2 2 Whenever Cojocar Huntress deals combat damage, add one mana of any color. You don’t lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Sluggish Consumer ARD G 2G 3 Creature - Vampire Slug 3/3 2 Reach Hunt — Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, you may destroy target enchantment or artifact. If you don’t, gain 2 life.
Rabid Bite ARD G 1G 2 Sorcery 3 Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control.
Sewer Monster ARD U 2U 3 Creature - Tentacle Horror 2/2 2 Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 blue Human Tentacle creature token.
Gamekeeper Vampire ARD B 2B 3 Creature - Vampire Scout 3/1 2 As long as its your turn, Vampires you control have lifelink.
Horde Captain ARD B 1B 2 Creature - Vampire Berserker 2/2 2 Cannibalize — Whenever one or more creatures you control die for the first time each turn, draw a card and lose 1 life.
Artist of Blood ARD R 1R 2 Creature - Vampire Noble 1/1 2 Whenever Artist of Blood or another creature dies, Artist of Blood deals 1 damage to target player.
horrific experiment name ARD G 1G 2 Creature - Human Horror 1/1 2 Whenever you draw your second card each turn put two +1/+1 counters on horrific experiment name.
snake name ARD G GG 2 Creature - Vampire Snake 2/2 2 Hunt — Whenever a creature dealt damage by snake name this turn dies, put X +1/+1 counters on snake name where X is the creatures power.
Silas defense name ARD UG GU 2 Creature - Horror 0/4 2 Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Silas defense name gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
Hunters to Hunted ARD UB UB 2 Instant 3 Target creature has base toughness 0 until end of turn.
Legion Lieutenant ARD WB WB 2 Creature - Vampire Knight 2/2 2 Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.
Broodmother Bear ARD RG 1RG 3 Creature - Vampire Bear 5/1 2 Trample Hunt — Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, create a 2/2 red and green Vampire Bear token.
Preemptive Dismissal ARD WU WU 2 Instant 3 The next time one or more creatures would enter the battlefield, exile them instead.
flash cleric name ARD WU 2WU 4 Creature - Vampire Cleric 2/1 2 Flash When flash cleric name enters the battlefield, exile target spell or creature. When flash cleric name leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner’s hand.
Silas' Command ARD UG GU 2 Instant 3 Choose two — • Draw a card. • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • Counter target activated or triggered ability.
Tome of The Old Ways ARD
2 2 Legendary Artifact 1 2, T: Draw a card.
Unlucky Number ARD W XW 1 Enchantment 1 Unlucky Number enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Opponents can’t cast spells with a mana value equal to the number of counters on Unlucky Number.
Quick Appetizer ARD B B 1 Creature - Human Serf 0/1 2 Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, you may pay 1 life, if you do it gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When Quick Appetizer dies, gain life equal to the number of Vampires you control.
Wurm of Endless Night ARD R 4RR 6 Creature - Vampire Wurm 6/6 2 Whenever Wurm of Endless Night enters the battlefield or attacks, choose two nonenchantment permanents an opponent controls and put raze counters on them. Hunt — Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, destroy target permanent with a raze counter on at random.
Shifting Radge ARD G 2G 3 Creature - Vampire Beast 3/4 2 Shifting Radge can’t block. Hunt — Whenever a creature dealt damage by Shifting Radge this turn dies, Shifting Radge fights target creature an opponent controls.
crab thing ARD UG G/U 1 Creature - Crab Horror 3/3 2 Flash crab thing can’t attack or block unless you’ve draw two or more cards this turn.
Battles of Ardelean ARD WB 3W/BW/B 5 Sorcery 3 Choose one - Destroy all Vampire creatures. Destroy all non-Vampire creatures.
Endless Ranks ARD BR B/R 1 Enchantment 1 At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a token you control. Then create a tapped 1/1 red Vampire Berserker token with haste.
Isolation ARD WU 2WU 4 Enchantment 1 When Isolation enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent or card in a graveyard. Whenever a permanent with the exiled name would enter the battlefield or be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
Keikos, Cannibal Queen ARD BR 2BR 4 Legendary Creature - Vampire Berserker 3/2 2 Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, Keikos deals 1 damage to each player. Sacrifice another creature: Exile the top card of your library, you may cast that card. If you don’t, put it into your graveyard.
Felicia Von Evil ARD WB 2WB 4 Legendary Creature - Vampire Noble 3/3 2 Vigilance Whenever you cast a spell, lose 1 life and create a 1/1 white and black Vampire Knight creature token.
Silas, Bloodlord of Progress ARD UG 2GU 4 Legendary Creature - Vampire Artificer 3/3 2 At the beginning of each players upkeep, they draw a card. Whenever a player drawing a card triggers an ability of a permanent, copy that ability, you may choose new targets for it.
Dark Towers ARD
0 Land 0 Dark Towers enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add W or B, If you’ve gained 3 or more life this turn, add WB instead.
Dimlit Backstreets ARD
0 Land 0 Dimlit Backstreets enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add U or B. If an opponent has discarded a card this turn or has no cards in their hand, add UB instead.
Fortress of Sanctuary ARD
0 Land 0 Fortress of Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add W or U, if you’ve cast exactly one spell spell this turn, add WU instead.
Grotesque Laboratory ARD
0 Land 0 Grotesque Laboratory enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add G or U, If you’ve drawn two or more cards this turn, add GU instead.
Hostile Wildlands ARD
0 Land 0 Hostile Wildlands enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add R or G. If you’ve attacked with a creature with power 4 or greater this turn, add RG instead.
Sorin, Liberator of Ardyal ARD WB 1WB 3 Legendary Planeswalker - Sorin 3 1 As long as it’s your turn, Sorin, Liberator of Ardyal is a 3/3 Vampire Noble creature with lifelink and menace. [+1]: Sorin, Liberator of Ardyal deals 2 damage to target player. [-3]: Exile target nonland permanent, you lose 3 life.
Malorum, Banefather ARD UB 2UB 4 Legendary Planeswalker - Malorum 4 1 You may look at the top card of each library at any time. [+1]: Exile the top card of target players library. [0]: Choose a card exiled by a Malorum planeswalker, you may cast it and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell. [-3]: Choose a nonland card name. Search each opponent’s graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. They shuffle.
Obilic the Devastator ARD RG 4RG 6 Legendary Creature - Vampire Dragon Warrior 6/6 2 Flying, Haste, Trample Obilic has abilities of cards exiled by it. Hunt — Whenever a creature dealt damage by Obilic the Devastator this turn dies, exile it and put a +1/+1 counter on Obilic.
The Binding of Cassien ARD
Cassien the Liberated 5 5 Legendary Artifact 1 At the beginning of your upkeep, gain 4 life, then if you have 10 or more life than your starting life total, transform The Binding of Cassien. --- (Back): Cassien the Liberated
Cassien the Liberated ARD W
5 Legendary Creature - Angel God 5/5 2 Flying, Lifelink, Indestructible Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control. --- (Front): The Binding of Cassien
Father of the Future ARD UG Regeneration Chamber 3GU 5 Legendary Creature - Horror 5/5 2 As long as you’ve drawn two or more cards this turn Father of the Future can’t be blocked. When Father of the Future dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner’s control. --- (Back): Regeneration Chamber
Regeneration Chamber ARD UG
5 Legendary Enchantment 1 If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead then put a reassembly counter on Regeneration Chamber. Then if there are three or more reassembly counters on it, remove those counters and transform it. --- (Front): Father of the Future
Thoughts to Plowshares ARD B B 1 Sorcery 3 Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Then they search their library for a basic land, reveal it and put it into their hand.
Met at the Crossroads ARD G G 1 Enchantment 1 At the beginning of each players combat choose a creature that player owns. It gains haste until end of turn.
